terms.title: Terms and conditions
terms.1: Foremost, you have to love monkeys and bananas.
terms.2: By registering on our platform, you agree to provide accurate and complete information.
terms.3: You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account credentials.
terms.4: You must notify us immediately of any unauthorized use of your account or any other security breach.
terms.5: Users must be at least 18 years old to register on our platform.
terms.6: We reserve the right to suspend or terminate accounts that violate our policies.
terms.7: Your personal information will be handled in accordance with our Privacy Policy.
terms.8: We may send you important notifications related to your account and service updates.
terms.9: I have read and agreed to these Terms and Conditions.
